articles.author: https://www.rt.com/about-us
articles.title: Russia's Space Agency Announces New Mars Mission
articles.description: Roscosmos reveals plans for a groundbreaking mission to Mars, aimed at exploring the planet's surface and atmosphere.
articles.content: Russia's space agency, Roscosmos, has officially announced its upcoming mission to Mars, scheduled for launch in 2026. This ambitious project aims to conduct in-depth studies of the Martian surface and atmosphere, contributing significantly to our understanding of the Red Planet.… [+630 chars]
